ch.bfh.ti.gapa.cli

Class CliImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.bfh.ti.gapa.cli.CliImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cli

    public class CliImpl
extends Object
implements Cli
    Main entry point for the application. Parses command line arguments, loads configuration data and passes the configuration to the process layer.

               Consumer<String> printer,
               CliPrintOptions cliPrintOptions)
        Parameters:
        processLayer - read config data is passed to the process layer
        configFileReader - reads the config file
        commandLineArgumentsReader - reads configuration from command line arguments
        cliInputParser - parses read config data
        infoPrinter - prints data
        cliConfigOptions - contains allowed command line options for configuration
        nonBlockingInputStream - used to request input from the user
        cliPrintOptions - command line options to print information about the application
        printer - that takes the resulting plantUml
